column1: THIS FILE CONTAINS ALL TEXT USED IN THE APP AND IS READ BY TRANSLATIONS.JAVA

column2: Chin up; you''ve got the next one!

column2: Incorrect. Chin up; you''ve got the next one

column2: Almost right! Check your spaces and hyphens.

Hē; tēnā anō / Incorrect; try once more.
